member.name: SHDRAGIMAGE
member.summary: Contains the information needed to create a drag image.

member.name: SHDRAGIMAGE.sizeDragImage
member.summary: A structure with the length and width of the drag image.

member.name: SHDRAGIMAGE.ptOffset
member.summary: A structure that specifies the location of the cursor within the drag image. The structure should contain the offset from the upper-left corner of the drag image to the location of the cursor.

member.name: SHDRAGIMAGE.crColorKey
member.summary: The color used by the control to fill the background of the drag image.
